personal.name: Shamal Musthafa
personal.title: Data Scientist | Generative AI & Business Intelligence

summary: A Data Scientist with over two years of experience delivering end-to-end data solutions. Core competencies include automating complex data workflows with Alteryx, developing advanced Generative AI and LLM applications using Python, and translating data into actionable insights through dynamic visualizations in Tableau and Power BI. Leverages this diverse skill set across various projects to solve complex business challenges and drive data-driven decision-making.

experience.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Led the end-to-end development of enterprise AI solutions using Azure AI and OpenAI, enhancing customer service capabilities.
Engineered and automated complex data preparation workflows with Alteryx, reducing data processing time by over 30%.
Developed interactive dashboards in Power BI and Tableau to monitor business KPIs and deliver critical insights to stakeholders.
Built and deployed enterprise chatbots using Dialogflow CX, integrating Gemini and OpenAI models to improve conversational intelligence.
Implemented RAG-based solutions with Azure OpenAI, increasing chatbot response accuracy by 40% by leveraging internal documentation.
Designed and developed scalable RESTful APIs and custom middleware using FastAPI to efficiently manage high-volume chatbot conversations.
Created an intelligent search system using Azure OpenAI for highly accurate, context-aware information retrieval from enterprise data.
Provided development support to the frontend team on various ReactJS projects.

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
responsibilities: Utilized Alteryx for efficient data cleansing, transformation, and analysis of customer call data, improving data quality for reporting.
Built insightful dashboards in Power BI from processed call data to identify key performance trends and customer satisfaction metrics.
Analyzed customer call transcripts using OpenAI Whisper and NLP techniques to extract actionable business insights.

projects.title: RAG Chatbot Assistant
projects.description: Developed a context-aware chatbot using RAG with OpenAI & Gemini for accurate, source-based answers.

projects.title: AI Financial Advisor
projects.description: Created a platform for financial insights and AI-driven recommendations with Plotly visualizations.

projects.title: Call Center Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Built a Power BI dashboard with data prepared in Alteryx to identify call drivers and sentiment trends.

projects.title: AI-Powered Customer Churn Predictor
projects.description: Built end-to-end ML solution with 84.6% ROC AUC, featuring advanced feature engineering and full-stack deployment.

education.degree: Master of Science in Data Science

certifications.name: Modern Natural Language Processing (NLP) using Deep Learning (Udemy)
